pkgmetadata.longdescription: Helper files for CopywriteR // This package contains the helper files that are required to run the Bioconductor package CopywriteR. It contains pre-assembled 1kb bin GC-content and mappability files for the reference genomes hg18, hg19, hg38, mm9 and mm10. In addition, it contains a blacklist filter to remove regions that display CNV. Files are stored as GRanges objects from the GenomicRanges Bioconductor package.
